column5: Coming up the last week of June. Wondering if the walleyes will still be below the rapids and falls. And the going price of fuel per liter what it is running. Thanks

If you mean the rapids near the Ear Falls section of Lac Seul, you can try the Rapids, but most of the fish will have moved out into the lake by then. I have fished the west end of LS in late May and early June for years, the later in the season the deeper are the walleyes. We used to fish the Rapids when the open date was June 1st, my boat/cabin buddies birthday! The walleyes will be there, just in differnt spots! Good Luck! Next saturday, we hit the Lac!
